name: Dog Fight (itch) (NYU Game Center - High School Programs)
name_original: Dog Fight (itch) (NYU Game Center - High School Programs)
description:
<< Use fullscreen button in lower right! >>

 by Sarah Applebaum, Wancy Chen, Jasmine Chu and Mohammad Hasan

Dogfight is a local 2-player game where your goal is to eliminate the other player by destroying their plane!

P1: W, S (to turn) / C (to shoot)

P2:  O, K (to turn) / M (to shoot)
developers: NYU Game Center - High School Programs
